I'm not talking about those online scams that promise you'll get checks for doing absolutely no work. You Have 10 Days

Posted May 13, 2010

According to the CAN-SPAM Act of 2003, if you sign up to receive emails from a website, they have to include an "Unsubscribe" link at the bottom of each email. This is so companies have to continually try and earn the right to our attention. If their emails ever become more of an annoyance than an interest, we have the right to remove ourselves from their list.According to the CAN-SPAM Act, once a customer clicks...
